root: ^Hard ass Scientist with a doctorate meets Himbo (who also has a doctorate)
^Science is an art and I refuse to back down

^Franci Mercury, a Chemist working in the Lab of Standardized CrimoPharmocology, is on the verge of creating something revolutionary. Their bosses don’t have the same confidence so they assign Franci the newest member of the Lab as an assistant. Franci, first annoyed, realizes the passion and creativity that their new partner, Joey Balabowie, exudes. For the first time in their career and possibly life, they are happy.
